text_result.title: Disabled Village Children Page 228
text_result.fulltxt:
<ul>
 <li><strong>. . . </strong> it burns when he pees The person with spinal cord damage may not feel this burning and therefore has to use other signs to know when he has an infection He may learn to recognize certain unpleasant feelings or may only know that he does<strong>  . . .</strong></li>
 </ul>
